title: Ranked Game bug..
body: Ok so im in the queue as in normal game everythings fine and then when the game starts and it's loading i get this error your game in not playable anymore. you are free to go play another game.. and then i loose Lp because of this error.. lost already 32 LP and i dont know what to do didn't wanted to keep loosing the Lp so i didn't risked to go on another game so pls someone help :/

replies.body: When you queue up and accept a match, the has to grab everyone and put them in together.  It sounds like you may be having a connection issue that's pretty much failing to establish that connection and leaving you behind.  I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix up whatever is causing this communication issue and get you in-game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
